column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I love egg salad sandwiches
column2: but what you get is homemade rye bread (awesome
column3: per comment above) with a bland "typical" egg salad on one half and a just-barely poached egg on the other.  The bread is sliced "Texas Style" (see comment above about serving size).  What you have is a sandwich that can't be eaten without being an absolute mess.  I don't know about you
column4: but I don't like wearing my sandwich.
